definitions.definition: recognize or ascertain what makes (someone or something) different.
examples: children can differentiate the past from the present

definitions.definition: identify differences between (two or more things or people).
examples: he is unable to differentiate between fantasy and reality
synonyms: tell apart "he was unable to differentiate between fantasy and reality"

definitions.definition: make (someone or something) appear different or distinct.
examples: Twain was careful to differentiate Huck's speech from that of other white people
synonyms: mark off "this differentiates their business from all other booksellers"

definitions.definition: make or become different in the process of growth or development.
examples: the receptors are developed and differentiated into sense organs
